snippet.title: Borderlands 2 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The time is now to take out Handsome Jack.  Gather up your friends as you run rampant through the world collecting bazillions of loot and guns in an effort to save Pandora from the evil grips of the Hyperion Corporation.

Borderlands 2 launches September 18, 2012 in North America and September 21, 2012 Internationally.

Come hang out on the Official Borderlands Forums - http://gbxforums.gearboxsoftware.com/
Follow us out on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/gearboxsoftware
Follow our publisher on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/2KGames
Like us on Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/BorderlandsGame
